text: Me amegha gɨvazɨma, arazir kamra a wain apir kap inigha kamaghɨn mɨgei, “Kavɨn aven itir wainɨn kam, an Akar Dɨkɨrɨzir Gavgavir Igiam, kɨ uan ghuzimɨn a gamizɨma, a ia bagha iri.22:19-20 Fofozir gumazir maba kamaghɨn nɨghnɨsi, vezɨn kamɨn itir akaba, Luk uabɨ da osirizir puvatɨ. Gumazir igharazim gɨn a da osiri.
